original_body_lines: A video is being circulated on social media, witnessing a foreign woman dressing up in  Podi Menike express train as a 'Sri Lankan bride'.
According to the video, the woman was seen dressing in full Kandyan wedding attire while the train was on the move to Colombo from Kandy.

It was reported that a beautician who was returning from a bridal dressing competition helped dress a foreigner onboard the Podi Menike train in Kandyan bridal attire. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
